title: The Killing of Freddie Gray, Addendum 16 â€“ Where Do We Go From Here?
description:
June 29, 2017 / Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray team, including Justine Barron, Amelia McDonell-Perry, Marcia Chatelain, and Rabia Chaudry, as they close out this 16 part series.
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.

#undisclosed  #freddiegray #justiceforfreddie #udaddendum
